description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.rules.0yJjfyvWg5pDLcVR]{Conditions}

>@Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} + @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.nEJIWMKbPjqKuelo]{Dead} + @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious}

If you were @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} but spent Resolve Points to stabilize (see Using Resolve Points beginning on page 250 in Injury and Death), or if you received healing from an ally, you are @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.H51jmhxF9XuwDOE7]{Stable}.

You are no longer @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying}, but you are still unconscious.
